laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B test
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

Increasing dilation of the air-filled loops of small bowel, with the largest measuring 5.7 cm. Several air-fluid levels seen on the upright image, suggestive of continued partial small bowel obstruction or possibly an ileus. No evidence of free air.
